name: Classic Story
description: Share any topic with a movie-style narrative that captivates the audience.

name: Challenge-Resolution
description: Identify current business challenges, trace their origins, and recommend actionable solutions.

name: Persuasive Sales
description: Create awareness & alignment for your prospective customer

name: Justice
description: Promote justice and equality in a manner that reflects the ethos of Martin Luther King Jr.'s "I Have a Dream" speech.

name: Innovation
description: Unveil a revolutionary product and highlight innovation, echoing Steve Jobs's "iPhone Keynote" in 2007.

name: Venture Pitch
description: Secure Series A or Series B funding to accelerate startup growth.

name: Company Intro
description: Present the company's mission, offerings, and unique value propositions in order to attract and engage potential customers.

name: Project Proposal
description: Outline a proposed project's objectives, execution strategies, timeline, and expected results.

name: Rags to Riches
description: Present a journey from initial failure to eventual success, demonstrating resilience, grit, and perseverance.

name: Strategic Advisory
description: Provide expert management-consultant guidance, improve business performance and achieve organizational goals.

name: Focus
description: Highlight a clear focus that will drive efficient, successful business outcomes. Inspired by Jeff Bezos's 1997 "Letter to Shareholders".

name: Underdog Victory
description: Share about somebody or something that despite being overlooked or underestimated, triumphs in the end.

name: Weekly Progress
description: Communicate key activities, performance metrics, and focus areas to foster transparency and alignment.

name: Business Narrative
description: Communicate a business strategy or solution through a relatable and engaging story.

name: Educate
description: Sharing scientific information in an engaging way, inspired by the style of Mary Roach's eye-opening talk in 2009.

name: Business Review
description: Review recent activities to identify achievements, challenges, and potential areas for improvement.

name: Failure Analysis
description: Study an identified failure, explore its causes and impact, propose recovery strategies.

name: Status Update
description: Update a stakeholder on progress, issues, and results for transparency and improvement.

name: Marketing Strategy
description: Discuss focused plans and tactics for effectively reaching and engaging potential customers.

name: Performance Review
description: Analytical review of individual, team, or company performance with relevant and data-driven metrics.

name: Survey Analysis
description: Examine and interpret data gathered from a survey to uncover patterns, insights, or trends that will inform decision making.

name: Trend Analysis
description: Identify and discuss patterns based on data to better understand performance and predict future scenarios.

name: Persuade
description: Win the audience with artful argument, mirror the engaging style of Ken Robinson's 2006 speech, "Do Schools Kill Creativity".

name: Reveal
description: Uncover new insights to alter perceptions, in the style of Amy Cuddy's transformative 2012 talk on body language.

name: Board Meeting
description: Keep board members informed and aligned, while facilitating valuable advice and discussion.

name: Quarterly Review
description: Provide a comprehensive quarterly business update and facilitate discussion for continuous improvement.

name: Early Startup Pitch
description: Secure seed or pre-seed funding from investors with a compelling vision.

name: Product Launch
description: Introduce a new product and persuade the audience to adopt it.

name: Survival Story
description: Showcase the determination necessary to overcome adversity, aimed to inspire and motivate the audience.

name: Capacity Planning
description: Review plans and ensure that a business has sufficient resources to meet changing business demands.

name: Employee Review
description: Assess an employee's work performance, provide constructive feedback and set future goals.

name: Performance Improvement Plan
description: Aid a struggling employee by identifying performance issues and present solutions that will improve their work.

name: TBD
description: TBD2

name: TBD2
description: TBD2

name: Operational Review
description: Logical Flow, Situation > Complication > Resolution, Roadmap/Action Plan
